scripts:
set ACL for bullseye-anti-flicker-service-user
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,jcr:modifyProperties,jcr:addChildNodes on /conf,/apps/bullseye-aem
end

set ACL for bullseye-cf-recs-service-user
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,jcr:modifyProperties,jcr:addChildNodes on /conf,/apps/bullseye-aem,/content/dam
end
